entities.name: room
entities.description: The room is described as having rough stone walls and a large fire at the far end.

entities.name: fire
entities.description: The fire is mentioned as the source of most of the light in the room.

entities.name: pipe smoke
entities.description: The pipe smoke is described as hanging in the air like battle fumes.

entities.name: shapes
entities.description: The menacing shapes are mentioned as looming through the haze of pipe smoke.

relationships.description: The room contains a large fire at the far end.
The haze of pipe smoke obscures the menacing shapes.
